Package nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load

Generic classes for the NBA import.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CSVTransformer<T>
    An extension of the Transformer interface that narrows the input of the transformer to CSV records.
    ElasticSearchLoader.IdGenerator<T>
    An interface that specifies how an ElasticSearch _id is to be extracted from the object about to be indexed.
    ElasticSearchLoader.ParentIdGenerator<T>
    An interface that specifies how an ElasticSearch _parent is to be extracted from the object about to be indexed.
    LoadConstants
    Constants used throughout the import library.
    MimeTypeCache
    Interface specifying the capacities of a mimetype cache for the medialib.
    Transformer<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Defines the capacities of a transformation component within the ETL process.
    XMLTransformer<OUTPUT>
    An extension of the Transformer interface that narrows the input of the transformer to XML records.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCSVTransformer<OUTPUT>
    Base class for Transformers that take a CSV record as input.
    AbstractMimeTypeCache
    Abstract base class for mimetype caches.
    AbstractTransformer<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Abstract base class for all transformers.
    AbstractXMLTransformer<OUTPUT>
    Base class for transformers that take XML elements as their input.
    ArrayMimeTypeCache
    Implementation of MimeTypeCache that uses a sorted array as backbone for the mime type cache.
    CSVExtractor
    A generic CSV extraction component taking raw CSV lines as input and outputting commons-csv CSVRecordInfo instances.
    CSVImportUtil
    Utility class for working with commons-csv.
    CSVRecordInfo
    A java bean encapsulating a commons-csv CSVRecord instance, the line within the CSV file from which it was created, and the line number of the line.
    ElasticSearchLoader<T>
    Abstract base class for objects responsible for the insertion of data into ElasticSearch (a.k.a.
    ETLStatistics
    A Java bean maintaining a set of running totals for an ETL program.
    LoadUtil
    Utility class providing common functionality used throughout this library.
    MapMimeTypeCache
    Implementation of MimeTypeCache that uses a TreeMap as backbone for the mime type cache.
    MimeTypeCacheFactory
    Produces a MimeTypeCache instances based on the value of a system property named "mimetypecache.type".
    NBAImportAll
    The "main" class of the import library.
    Registry
    Class providing centralized access to core services such as logging and elasticsearch.
    ThemeCache
    A cache that maps UnitIDs to "themes".
    TransformUtil
    Provides common functionality for the various Transformer implementations in this library.
    XMLRecordInfo
    A Java bean representing an XML record (something that comes out of an XML extractor and goes into an XMLTransformer).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DocumentType
    Enumerates the three ElasticSearch document types within the NBA index.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CSVExtractor.NoSuchFieldException
    Thrown by a CSVExtractor if a client specified an invalid field number (less than zero or greater than the number of fields in the CSV record).
    ETLRuntimeException
    Generic runtime exception thrown throughout this library in case of unrecoverable errors.
    ExtractionException Deprecated
    Should be handled and logged by Transformers without throwing an exception.
    InitializationException
    Thrown during the instantion of the central Registry object if anything goes wrong while configuring the services it provides.
    InvalidDataException Deprecated
    Should be handled and logged by Transformers without throwing an exception.
    MalformedDataException Deprecated
    Should be handled and logged by Transformers without throwing an exception.
    NameMismatchException
    Thrown when some part of a ScientificName does not match the corresponding part in a DefaultClassification or set of Monomials.
    SkippableDataException Deprecated
    Should be handled and logged by Transformers without throwing an exception.

Package nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load Description

Generic classes for the NBA import. This packages provides a set of interfaces and abstract classes that together constitute the ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework for the NBA import. These interfaces and abstract classes are implemented c.q. extended by all datasource-specific import libraries except the NSR import library, which still needs to be converted to the new framework.
